column.name: Type
column.remarks: Label: Account Type Picklist: Prospect | Customer - Direct | Customer - Channel | Channel Partner / Reseller | Installation Partner | Technology Partner | Other

column.name: ParentId
column.remarks: Label: Parent Account ID Referenced: ChildAccounts

column.name: Industry
column.remarks: Label: Industry Picklist: Agriculture | Apparel | Banking | Biotechnology | Chemicals | Communications | Construction | Consulting | Education | Electronics | Energy | Engineering | Entertainment | Environmental | Finance | Food & Beverage | Government | Healthcare | Hospitality | Insurance | Machinery | Manufacturing | Media | Not For Profit | Recreation | Retail | Shipping | Technology | Telecommunications | Transportation | Utilities | Other

column.name: Ownership
column.remarks: Label: Ownership Picklist: Public | Private | Subsidiary | Other

column.name: Rating
column.remarks: Label: Account Rating Picklist: Hot | Warm | Cold

column.name: CustomerPriority__c
column.remarks: Label: Customer Priority Picklist: High | Low | Medium

column.name: SLA__c
column.remarks: Label: SLA Picklist: Gold | Silver | Platinum | Bronze

column.name: UpsellOpportunity__c
column.remarks: Label: Upsell Opportunity Picklist: Maybe | No | Yes

column.name: Expiration_Date__c
column.remarks: Label: Expiration Date Help: Expired achievements will not be displayed in the users profile page

column.name: Hidden__c
column.remarks: Label: Hidden Help: If checked, the achievement won't be displayed in the user's profile page

column.name: Is_Internal__c
column.remarks: Label: Is Internal Help: If checked, the achievement won't be displayed to external users

column.name: Override_Completed_Status__c
column.remarks: Label: Override Completed Status Help: Overriding the completed status will make the Achievement Assignments go to the defined "override status" instead of "Acquired". It's up to you move to the "Acquired" status once this feature is used. Picklist: In Review

column.name: Override_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Override URL Help: Specify a value if you want users to go to this URL when clicking the Achievement Image. This can be used to redirect to a custom page where you manage additional steps before changing the status of the Achievement to "Acquired".

column.name: Enable_Printing__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable Printing Help: Launch the Achievement Print URL when clicking the Acquired Achievement

column.name: Status__c
column.remarks: Label: Status Picklist: Eligible | Acquired | Expired

column.name: Training_Plan_Achievement__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Plan Achievement Referenced: Achievement_Assignments__r

table.name: Answer_Sequence_Item__c
table.remarks: Labels: Answer Sequence Item | Answer Sequence Items

column.name: Answer_Sequence__c
column.remarks: Label: Answer Sequence Referenced: Answer_Sequence_Items__r (cascade delete)

table.name: Batch_Operation_Record__c
table.remarks: Labels: Batch Operation Record | Batch Operation Records

column.name: Training_Plan_Batch_Operation__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Plan Batch Operation Referenced: Batch_Operation_Records__r (cascade delete)

column.name: Mile_Radius__c
column.remarks: Label: Mile Radius Default: 0.020 Help: Mile radius around the specified latitude/longitude for users to do a valid check-in

column.name: AccountId
column.remarks: Label: Account ID Referenced: Contacts (cascade delete)

column.name: Salutation
column.remarks: Label: Salutation Picklist: Mr. | Ms. | Mrs. | Dr. | Prof.

column.name: LeadSource
column.remarks: Label: Lead Source Picklist: Web | Phone Inquiry | Partner Referral | Purchased List | Other

column.name: Level__c
column.remarks: Label: Level Picklist: Secondary | Tertiary | Primary

table.name: Learning__c
table.remarks: Labels: Learning | Learning Objects Record Types: Check-In | Quiz | Resource | Rich Text | Task

column.name: Current_Published_Version__c
column.remarks: Label: Current Published Version Referenced: Learnings__r

column.name: Duration_hours__c
column.remarks: Label: Duration (hours) Formula: if(!ISBLANK(Duration__c), IF(Duration__c > 59, TEXT(FLOOR((Duration__c)/60))&" hr(s) "&TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Duration__c)/60,1)*60))&" mins" ,TEXT(FLOOR(Duration__c))&" mins" ) ,"")

column.name: Sync_progress__c
column.remarks: Label: Sync progress across assignments Help: Enable this checkbox if you plan to add this learning to multiple training plans and you would like to keep progress in sync between plans

column.name: Completed_On__c
column.remarks: Label: Completed On Help: Date this assignment was completed

column.name: Evaluation_Result_Text__c
column.remarks: Label: Evaluation Result Text Formula: TEXT( Evaluation_Result__c )

column.name: Evaluation_Result__c
column.remarks: Label: Evaluation Result Picklist: Passed | Failed | N/A

column.name: Is_Test_Assignment__c
column.remarks: Label: Is Test Assignment Help: This flag indicates that this assignment is created for preview purposes while creating new Learning objects

column.name: Last_Published_Learning_Version_Decision__c
column.remarks: Label: Last Published Learning Version Decision Picklist: New version taken | Keep using old version

column.name: Last_Published_Learning_Version__c
column.remarks: Label: Last Published Learning Version Referenced: Learning_Assignments__r

column.name: Progress__c
column.remarks: Label: Progress Picklist: Not Started | In Progress | In Review | Completed | Cancelled

column.name: Shared_Learning_Assignment__c
column.remarks: Label: Shared Learning Assignment Referenced: Learning_Assignments__r

column.name: Training_Plan_Section_Assignment__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Plan Section Assignment Referenced: Learning_Assignments__r

column.name: Training_Plan_Section_Item__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Plan Section Item Referenced: Learning_Assignments__r

column.name: Training_Plan_Section__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Plan Section Referenced: Learning_Assignments__r

column.name: Previous_Version_Progress__c
column.remarks: Label: Previous Version Progress Picklist: Not Started | In Progress | In Review | Completed | Cancelled

column.name: Times_Launched__c
column.remarks: Label: Times Launched Help: Times the learning object linked to this assignment has been launched

column.name: Background_Image_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Background Image URL Help: URL for the image displayed in the catalog detail header

column.name: Hide_From_Catalog_Home__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide from Catalog Home Help: Enable this option if you do not want to display this catalog in the catalog home page

column.name: Is_Internal__c
column.remarks: Label: Is Internal Help: Enable this option if you do not want to display this catalog to external users

column.name: Logo__c
column.remarks: Label: Logo Help: URL for the image displayed for this catalog in the catalog page

column.name: Order__c
column.remarks: Label: Order Help: Number that defines the position in which this catalog will appear in the catalog page

column.name: Text_Color__c
column.remarks: Label: Text Color Help: HEX Color code for the header text color (e.g. #333333, more examples in : http://www.color-hex.com/)

column.name: Enable_all_external_accounts__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable for all external users Help: Enabling this checkbox will expose this catalog to all external (Community/Portal) users

column.name: Enable_Catalog_Training_Plans__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable Catalog Training Plans Help: Check this option if you want to enable all training plans associated to this Catalog for the specified Account

column.name: Learning_Content_ID__c
column.remarks: Label: Learning Content ID Formula: IF( !ISBLANK(Task__c), Task__c, IF(!ISBLANK(Training_Resource__c), Training_Resource__c, IF(!ISBLANK(Quiz__c), Quiz__c ,"") ) )

column.name: Version_selection_behavior__c
column.remarks: Label: Version selection behavior Picklist: Ask user for version selection | Update version on launch | Update version and reset progress for previous versions

column.name: Update_Status__c
column.remarks: Label: Update Status Picklist: New | Pending | In Progress | Completed

table.name: LMS_Permission_Rule__c
table.remarks: Labels: LMS Permission Rule | LMS Permission Rules

column.name: Description__c
column.remarks: Label: Description Help: Optional description about this rule

column.name: Field_API_Name__c
column.remarks: Label: Field API Name Help: User object field API name

column.name: Field_Value__c
column.remarks: Label: Field Value Help: User object field expected value. If using a regex you can test it at https://regex101.com/

column.name: IsActive__c
column.remarks: Label: Is Active Help: Enable/disable the execution of this rule.

column.name: Operator__c
column.remarks: Label: Operator Help: Operator used in this rule. IN and NOT IN expect a list of comma separated values Picklist: equals | contains | starts with | ends with | in | not in | regex

table.name: LMS_Permission_Rule_PermSet__c
table.remarks: Labels: LMS Permission Rule PermSet | LMS Permission Rules PermSets

column.name: LMS_Permission_Rule__c
column.remarks: Label: LMS Permission Rule Referenced: LMS_Permission_Rule_PermSets__r (cascade delete)

column.name: PermSet_API_Name__c
column.remarks: Label: PermSet API Name Help: Permission Set API Name

column.name: Order__c
column.remarks: Label: Order Help: Order in which this plugin will be executed

column.name: Record_Type__c
column.remarks: Label: Record Type Help: Learning Record Type Name for which this plugin will be executed

column.name: Back_to_SF_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Back to SF URL Help: Must be a relative url path (e.g. /home/home.jsp)

column.name: Company_Logo__c
column.remarks: Label: Company Logo Help: URL for your company logo

column.name: Custom_Section_Name__c
column.remarks: Label: Custom Section Name Help: Name of a custom section displayed in the header

column.name: Custom_Section_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Custom Section URL Help: URL for your custom page (e.g. https://instance.salesforce.com/apex/myhomepage)

column.name: Disable_Correct_Response_Checkbox__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Correct Response Checkbox Help: Enable this option if you'd like to disable setting the correct response checkbox on every response

column.name: Disable_Feed_Item_Audit_Fields__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Audit Fields for Feed Items Help: Enable this option if you'd like to disable setting the created by id for achievement feed items

column.name: Disable_Future_Progress_Calculation__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Future Progress Calculation Help: Enable this option to force training plan progress calculation in a single transaction

column.name: Disable_Leaderboard_Refresh_On_Load__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Leaderboard Refresh On Load Help: Enable this option if you'd like disable leaderboard cache refresh on page load

column.name: Disable_Leaderboard__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Leaderboard Help: Enable this option if you'd like disable the homepage leaderboard

column.name: Disable_Track_Achievements__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Track Achievements Help: Enable this option to prevent automatic achievement assignment for track achievements

column.name: Enable_iOS_Tap_Fix__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable iOS Tap Fix Help: Enable this option if you're experiencing issues with taps in Salesforce1 + iOS8

column.name: Header_Background_Color__c
column.remarks: Label: Header Background Color Help: HEX value for the header background color. (e.g. #EEEEEE)

column.name: Header_Text_Color__c
column.remarks: Label: Header Text Color Help: HEX value for the header text color. (e.g. #EEEEEE)

column.name: Header_Text_Hover_Color__c
column.remarks: Label: Header Text Hover Color Help: HEX value for the header text hover color. (e.g. #EEEEEE)

column.name: Hide_Back_to_SF_Button__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide Back to SF Button Help: Enable this option if you'd like to hide back to SF button when the SF header is disabled

column.name: Show_Salesforce_Header__c
column.remarks: Label: Show Salesforce Header Help: Enable this option to show the Salesforce header for the end-user training pages

column.name: Google_Maps_API_Key__c
column.remarks: Label: Google Maps API Key Help: Replace this value with your custom Google Maps API Key (https://console.developers.google.com)

column.name: Disable_User_Certification_Uploads__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable User Certification Uploads Help: Enable this option if you'd like to prevent users from uploading certifications

column.name: Custom_Leader_Board_Report__c
column.remarks: Label: Custom Leader Board Report Help: Name of a custom report used for displaying leaderboard results

column.name: Disable_Learning_Preview_Redirection__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Learning Preview Redirection Help: Enable this option to disable the automatic learning redirection when previewing learning content

column.name: Hide_Training_Catalog_Section__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide Training Catalog Section Help: Enable this option to hide entry points to the training catalog

column.name: Hide_Training_Tracks_Section__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide Training Tracks Section Help: Enable this option to hide entry points to training tracks

column.name: Hide_Certifications_Section__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide Certifications Section Help: Enable this option to hide the certifications section in the achievements page

column.name: Hide_Community_Salesforce_Header__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide Salesforce Header in Communities Help: Enable this option to always hide the Salesforce headers in Communities and Portals

column.name: Custom_Logout_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Custom Logout URL Help: Custom Logout link used in the app header (e.g. /secur/logout.jsp)

column.name: Enable_Learning_Object_Sharing__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable Learning Object Sharing Help: Enable this option to share learning objects with users

column.name: Disable_Assignments_Version_Backup__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Assignments Version Backup Help: Enable this option to disable assignments backup when new versions are published

column.name: Enable_Previous_Version_Shared_Updates__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable Previous Version Shared Updates Help: Enable this option to allow shared assignments learnings to be updated to previous versions

column.name: Hide_Training_Plans_Progress_Info__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide Training Plans Progress Info Help: Enable this option to hide training plan progress info in the My Training page

column.name: Track_Learning_Object_Launch_Attempts__c
column.remarks: Label: Track Learning Object Launch Attempts Help: Enable this option to track launch attempts everytime a learning object is launched

column.name: Disable_Track_Progress_Calculation__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Track Progress Calculation Help: Enable this option to disable progress calculation for Training Track Assignments

column.name: Hide_User_Menu__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide User Menu Help: Enable this option to hide the user menu from the app header

column.name: Disable_Async_Permission_Rules__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Async Permission Rules Help: Enable this option to avoid running permission rules in async mode

column.name: Disable_User_Trigger__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable User Trigger Help: Enable this option to disable the LMS user trigger

column.name: Training_Payment_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Payment URL Help: URL for processing payments for payment-enabled Training Plans

column.name: Checkout_Plugin__c
column.remarks: Label: Checkout Plugin Help: Name of the checkout plugin used by the LMS

column.name: Achievement_Print_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Achievement Print URL Help: VF page url (e.g. /apex/PrintCertificate) to be used for printing Achievements

column.name: Community_Custom_Domain__c
column.remarks: Label: Community Custom Domain Help: Custom Domain to be used when building community URLs

column.name: Is_Cloudforce_Domain__c
column.remarks: Label: Is Cloudforce Domain Help: Enable this option if your org runs in a cloudforce.com domain

column.name: Question_Line__c
column.remarks: Label: Question Line Referenced: Questions__r (cascade delete)

column.name: Correct_Boolean__c
column.remarks: Label: Correct True/False Picklist: true | false

column.name: Type__c
column.remarks: Label: Type Picklist: Text | Number | SelectOneQuestion | SelectMultipleQuestion | True/False

column.name: Question_Bank_Question__c
column.remarks: Label: Question Bank Question Referenced: Questions__r

column.name: Public__c
column.remarks: Label: Public Help: Enable this checkbox to make this Question Bank available to all Admin and Publisher users

table.name: Question_Bank_Question__c
table.remarks: Labels: Question Bank Question | Question Bank Questions

column.name: Question_Bank__c
column.remarks: Label: Question Bank Referenced: Question_Bank_Questions__r (cascade delete)

column.name: Correct_Boolean__c
column.remarks: Label: Correct True/False Picklist: true | false

column.name: Type__c
column.remarks: Label: Type Picklist: Text | Number | SelectOneQuestion | SelectMultipleQuestion | True/False

column.name: Delete_Responses_On_Submission__c
column.remarks: Label: Delete Responses on Submission Help: Delete quiz response records after quiz submission

column.name: Max_Attempts__c
column.remarks: Label: Max Attempts Help: Maximum number of attempts to reach the passing score

column.name: Passing_Score__c
column.remarks: Label: Passing Score Help: Number between 0 and 100 that will determine the minimum percentage of correct answers to get a passing score

column.name: Display_Results_Summary__c
column.remarks: Label: Display Response Summary Help: Display a summary on quiz submission that shows correct/incorrect questions

column.name: Enable_Survey_Mode__c
column.remarks: Label: Survey Mode Help: Enabling Survey Mode prevents deleting responses on completion and scoring is disabled

column.name: Display_Topics_Summary__c
column.remarks: Label: Display Topics Summary Help: Display a summary on quiz submission that shows correct/incorrect topics

column.name: Time_Limit__c
column.remarks: Label: Time Limit (mins) Help: Number of minutes to complete the evaluation

column.name: Boolean_Response__c
column.remarks: Label: Boolean Response Picklist: true | false

column.name: Shared_Learning_Assignment__c
column.remarks: Label: Shared Learning Assignment Referenced: Responses__r

column.name: Shared_Learning_Assignment__c
column.remarks: Label: Shared Learning Assignment Referenced: Response_Summaries__r

column.name: Hide_Topics__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide Topics Help: Hide sidebar topics in rich text viewer

table.name: RichText_Content__c
table.remarks: Labels: Rich Text Content | Rich Text Content

column.name: RichText__c
column.remarks: Label: Rich Text Referenced: RichText_Contents__r (cascade delete)

column.name: Title__c
column.remarks: Label: Title Help: Title for this rich text content section

table.name: Shared_Learning_Assignment__c
table.remarks: Labels: Shared Learning Assignment | Shared Learning Assignments

column.name: Evaluation_Result_Text__c
column.remarks: Label: Evaluation Result Text Formula: TEXT( Evaluation_Result__c )

column.name: Evaluation_Result__c
column.remarks: Label: Evaluation Result Picklist: Passed | Failed | N/A

column.name: Last_Published_Learning_Version_Decision__c
column.remarks: Label: Last Published Learning Version Decision Picklist: New version taken | Keep using old version

column.name: Last_Published_Learning_Version__c
column.remarks: Label: Last Published Learning Version Referenced: Shared_LP_Learning_Assignments__r

column.name: Learning_Assignment_Last_Update__c
column.remarks: Label: Learning Assignment Last Update Referenced: Shared_Learning_Assignments__r

column.name: Progress_Text__c
column.remarks: Label: Progress Text Formula: TEXT( Progress__c )

column.name: Progress__c
column.remarks: Label: Progress Picklist: Not Started | In Progress | In Review | Completed | Cancelled

column.name: Add_training_parameters_to_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Add training parameters to URL Help: Enabling this option will pass context parameters to the External Resource URL. (e.g. https://someurl.com/?aid=ASSIGNMENT_ID&tid=TPLAN_ID)

column.name: Description_RTA__c
column.remarks: Label: Additional Description Help: Use this field to provide an additional description for the task

column.name: Description__c
column.remarks: Label: Description Help: Description for this task

column.name: Disable_Comments__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Comments Help: Enable this option if you do not want users to provide comments for this task

column.name: Disable_Undo__c
column.remarks: Label: Disable Undo for Completed Tasks Help: Enable this option if you do not want users to re-open a task marked as completed

column.name: Enable_Image_Upload__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable Image Upload Help: Enabling this option will require users to upload an image in order to complete the task

column.name: External_Resource_Name__c
column.remarks: Label: External Resource Name Help: "Friendly" name for the External Resource URL. If blank, the External Resource URL will be displayed

column.name: External_Resource_Target__c
column.remarks: Label: External Resource Target Help: Target window for displaying the External Resource URL. "blank" will open a new tab/window and "self" will use the current tab/window Picklist: blank | self

column.name: External_Resource_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: External Resource URL Help: URL to an external resource that will guide users on how to complete the task

column.name: Requires_Manager_Approval__c
column.remarks: Label: Requires Manager Approval to Complete Help: Enable this option if you want to require Manager's approval for completing the task. This option will use the standard Manager field in the User object

column.name: Background_Color__c
column.remarks: Label: Background Color Help: HEX Color code for the header background color (e.g. #dcdcdc, more examples in : http://www.color-hex.com/)

column.name: Background_Image_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Background Image URL Help: URL for the image displayed in the training plan detail header

column.name: Chatter_Notifications_Enabled__c
column.remarks: Label: Chatter Notifications Enabled Help: Disable this option if you don't want users to receive chatter notifications when they are assigned to this training plan.

column.name: Custom_Notification_Message__c
column.remarks: Label: Custom Notification Message Help: Custom message used for chatter notifications

column.name: Enable_Self_Registration__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable Self-Registration Help: Check this box if you'd like to make this training plan available to all your company and allow users to create assignments on-the-fly.

column.name: Enforce_Sequence__c
column.remarks: Label: Enforce Sequence Help: Enable this option to require users to complete the learning activities in the specified order

column.name: Hide_After_End_Date__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide After End Date Help: Hide this training plan for end-users if the current date is outside of the Start/End Date range

column.name: Hide_Chatter_Photos__c
column.remarks: Label: Hide Chatter Photos Help: Enable this option to hide chatter photos for the last users that have acquired the training plan achievement

column.name: Intro_Video_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Intro Video URL Help: URL for the embedded intro video shown in the training plan detail page

column.name: New_Until__c
column.remarks: Label: New Until Help: Display a New ribbon in the training plan until the specified date

column.name: Optional_Feedback_Comments__c
column.remarks: Label: Optional Feedback Comments Help: Enable this option to make feedback comments not required

column.name: Self_Registration_Access__c
column.remarks: Label: Self-Registration Access Help: "Public" or blank allows users to create assignments "on the fly". "Requires Approval" logs an approval request that is later handled by the Training Plan owner."External" exposes this training plan to all users. Picklist: Public | External | Requires Approval

column.name: Status__c
column.remarks: Label: Status Help: Only Active training plans will be visible to learners, Draft plans will be visible for Learning Admins Picklist: Draft | Archived | Active

column.name: Text_Color__c
column.remarks: Label: Text Color Help: HEX Color code for the header text color (e.g. #333333, more examples in : http://www.color-hex.com/)

column.name: Training_Plan_Rating__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Plan Rating Formula: IF( Total_Ratings_Count__c > 0 , Total_Ratings_Sum__c/Total_Ratings_Count__c, 0)

column.name: Max_Registrations__c
column.remarks: Label: Max Registrations Help: Maximum number of allowed registrations

column.name: About_RTA__c
column.remarks: Label: About Help: Information displayed in the about section of a training plan

column.name: Min_Items_For_Completion__c
column.remarks: Label: Min Items for Completion Help: Define a minimum # of learning items to complete in order to complete the training plan

column.name: Enable_Assignment_Management_for_Users__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable Assignment Management for Users Help: Enable this option to enable users with the "Manage External Assignments" custom permission to assign external users to this training plan

column.name: Do_Not_Reset_Progress_For_New_Versions__c
column.remarks: Label: Do Not Reset Progress For New Versions Help: Enable this option to prevent resetting progress for new versions of learning objects

column.name: Payment_Required__c
column.remarks: Label: Payment Required Help: Enable this option to require payment in order to register to this Training Plan

column.name: Name
column.remarks: Label: Training Plan Section Item ID

column.name: Training_Plan_Section__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Plan Section Referenced: Training_Plan_Section_Items__r (cascade delete)

column.name: Add_training_parameters_to_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Add training parameters to URL Help: Enabling this option will pass context parameters to the Resource URL. (e.g. https://someurl.com/?aid=ASSIGNMENT_ID&tid=TPLAN_ID)

column.name: Display_in_Iframe__c
column.remarks: Label: Display in Iframe Help: Enabling this option will load the Resource URL within an iframe instead of a new window

column.name: Prevent_completion_on_launch__c
column.remarks: Label: Delegate assignment completion Help: Learning objects of type "Resource" are marked as completed on launch by default, enable this option if you want to delegate the completion to the Resource URL

column.name: Resource_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Resource URL Help: URL of the learning resource you would like to use for this learning (e.g. https://someurl.com)

column.name: Achievement__c
column.remarks: Label: Achievement Help: The Achievement will determine the badge displayed in the training track box and header Referenced: Training_Tracks__r

column.name: Background_Color__c
column.remarks: Label: Background Color Help: HEX Color code for the header background color (e.g. #dcdcdc, more examples in : http://www.color-hex.com/)

column.name: Background_Image_URL__c
column.remarks: Label: Background Image URL Help: URL for the image displayed in the training track detail header

column.name: Enable_all_external_accounts__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable for all external users Help: Enabling this checkbox will expose this training track to all external (Community/Portal) users

column.name: New_Until__c
column.remarks: Label: New Until Help: Display a New ribbon in the training track until the specified date

column.name: Order__c
column.remarks: Label: Order Help: Number that defines the position in which this track will appear in the tracks page

column.name: Status__c
column.remarks: Label: Status Help: Training tracks are not available to end users until they are "Active" Picklist: Draft | Active

column.name: Text_Color__c
column.remarks: Label: Text Color Help: HEX Color code for the header text color (e.g. #333333, more examples in : http://www.color-hex.com/)

column.name: Learning_Category__c
column.remarks: Label: Catalog Help: Catalog used for grouping training tracks into sections Referenced: Training_Tracks__r

column.name: Assign_Only_Self_Registration_Plans__c
column.remarks: Label: Assign Only Self-Registration Plans Help: Only assign self-registration enabled Training Plans when assigning/registering for a Training Track

column.name: Enable_all_internal_users__c
column.remarks: Label: Enable for all internal users Help: Enabling this checkbox will expose this training track to all internal users

table.name: Training_Track_Account__c
table.remarks: Labels: Training Track Account | Training Track Accounts

table.name: Training_Track_Assignment__c
table.remarks: Labels: Training Track Assignment | Training Track Assignments

column.name: Completed_On__c
column.remarks: Label: Completed On Help: Date this assignment was completed

column.name: Status__c
column.remarks: Label: Status Picklist: Not Started | In Progress | Completed

table.name: Training_Track_Level__c
table.remarks: Labels: Training Track Level | Training Track Levels

column.name: Training_Track__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Track Referenced: Training_Track_Levels__r (cascade delete)

table.name: Training_Track_Level_Item__c
table.remarks: Labels: Training Track Level Item | Training Track Level Items

column.name: Name
column.remarks: Label: Training Track Level Item ID

column.name: Training_Track_Level__c
column.remarks: Label: Training Track Level Referenced: Training_Track_Level_Items__r (cascade delete)
